questions.question:
What do you want to talk about? I’ve got degrees 🎓🤓 in these subjects: 
 1- Am I ready to vote? ✉️ 
 2- What new laws mean for you 👀 
 Enter a number!
First things first... 🥶🎶 Are you registered to vote?
SWAG is forever! 😎 Are you planning to vote in person 🗳️ or mail in your ballot? 📮

responses.r3: Looks like there are some restrictions for mailing in your ballot in your state. Here's what you need to know:

questions.statement: To vote in person, you will need to bring an ID!

questions.question: Great! Let's check if your state has mail-in voting...I'm thinking
Do you have one of these main forms of ID?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that...please re-enter a number
